welcome_message_body: "Welcome to enchanting Chantilly, known for its picturesque scenery, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to discover all that our charming city has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as the primary hub for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as the hub for international flights and is home to several major airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as the hub for domestic flights and is home to several major airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Air Canada, Frontier, and Spirit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all commercial flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
